definition: farmstead/village/manor/place of business/banker (in a gambling game)/grave or solemn/holdings of a landlord (in imperial China)

sentences.english: Eg. The house on the hill overlooks the village.
sentences.chinese: 从小山上的房子可以俯视村庄。

sentences.english: In the tale of the Pied Piper, we have a village overrun with rats.
sentences.chinese: 魔笛的故事里，那个村庄鼠患泛滥。

sentences.english: And rural villagers in southern Africa harvest caterpillars from the local mopane trees.
sentences.chinese: 南非的一些农业村庄也从可乐豆木上收获毛虫。

sentences.english: But the polis also included the surrounding farmland, and the villages.
sentences.chinese: 一座希腊城市还包括周边的农田村庄。

sentences.english: This is in addition to the seven villages that have now been remediated.
sentences.chinese: 这一数字不包括现在正采取整治措施的七个村庄。

sentences.english: It is the representative power of the villagers' representatives that forms the specific basis of the village.
sentences.chinese: 正是村民代表的代表能力构成了特定的村庄基础。

sentences.english: Paul-de-Vence and Gourdon) as “One of the most beautiful villages of France.
sentences.chinese: 这个村庄自夸是“法国最美丽的村庄之一。”

sentences.english: Paul-de-Vence and Gourdon) as “One of the most beautiful villages of France.
sentences.chinese: 这个村庄自夸是“法国最美丽的村庄之一。”

sentences.english: So where's the pictures of the village theyare visiting?
sentences.chinese: 怎么没出现这个村庄的照片？

sentences.english: Some years ago, I visited a village in India called Uruvela.
sentences.chinese: 几年前，我访问了印度一个叫做优留毗罗的小村庄。

sentences.english: Well I am very pleased that we have finally arrived at our lovely village.
sentences.chinese: 现在我们最终来到我蔑晟爱的村庄，我感到非常高兴。

sentences.english: Its impact has been felt even in small villages in India and Africa.
sentences.chinese: 它的影响甚至连印度和非洲的小村庄里都已经感受到。

sentences.english: This is another picture of the village.
sentences.chinese: 这是我们村庄的另一张照片。

sentences.english: This is a village called Xinshan.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个名叫辛山的村庄。

sentences.english: Now 65 years later many in the villages here , such as Ste .
sentences.chinese: 现在，65年后，在这里的村庄，很多，如科技教育。

sentences.english: Ordinary people responded positively to the pilgrims who came into their villages.
sentences.chinese: 老百姓对来到他们村庄的朝圣者明确地作出了反应。
